events.name: Portfolio Night at Huge
events.description: Join us on Thursday, August 4, from 6:30 - 9:00 pm for a fun, interactive digital design portfolio workshop and mixer! During this event, attendees will not only get valuable tips for creating and presenting their portfolios, but will also get 1:1 time with designers at Huge to talk about their work.  All experience levels are welcome, attendees will be assigned 1:1's based on the time you arrive for the evening. Agenda: 6:30 - 7:00: Arrival and Mixing 7:00 - 7:30: Presentation by User Experience Director Kieran Weston and Associate Creative Director Tim Cripps 7:30 - 9:00: Breakout 1:1 sessions with Huge designers and snacks, drinks, and networking We look forward to seeing you there and don't forget to bring your portfolio! Location: Huge is located at 33 Ann Siang Rd, Suite 31A. Please check in with staff at the front door when you arrive.
events.location: Huge Singapore, 33 Ann Siang Rd, Suite 31A

events.name: On-going: Functional Programming in Scala Coursera Study Group
events.description: Study group for the Coursera Functional Programming in Scala Specialization, and all of it's courses.  Anyone may attend regardless of your progress in the courses.  We're here to help. If you have not already, please make sure that you have signed up for the courses you are interested in, on Coursera. <a>Functional Programming in Scala5-course Specialization·École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne</a> It's a good idea to have your development environment set up, before attending.  You can find instructions within the courses themselves.
events.location: Lowercase, 1 McNally St, Blk D #01-01, Singapore
